meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> of <radical>shrimp</radical> crashes into a <kanji>swamp</kanji>. Now the swamp is filled with shrimp. They used to live in the ocean, but the tsunami has carried them to their new home in the swamp.
readingMnemonic: Your house was right next to the <kanji>swamp</kanji> and on this side of your house you had many a <reading>tack</reading> (たく) there to hang things on. Now, on every tack there is skewered a shrimp. The force of the tsunami drove them into the tacks on the side of your house.
